title: The Spoilers
brief_description: Designed as a training film for employees of supermarkets to acquaint them with the dangers of poor sanitation practices. It furnishes fundamental knowledge of basic bacteriology in terms of bacteria, how they multiply and under what conditions, and dramatically points out the dangers microbes hold for human beings.
